introduction: You can fill in a form to claim Child Benefit, report a change in circumstances, check when your next Child Benefit payment is due or ask the Child Benefit Office a question.
more_information:
You'll need your:

- National Insurance number
- Child Benefit number (if you have one)
- child's birth certificate
- bank or building society account details
